Contact the recipient (by phone, for example) and work with them and their email admin to determine what policy or setting blocked your message and what you should do to make sure that future messages from you won't be rejected.

Hi Christos Foudoulis,    The German warehouse is experiencing low inventory levels, and there have been some unexpected delays in restocking. We have shipped your order via express courier, with the final leg handled by UPS. Should any customs duties arise, we will cover them for you—please rest assured.  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3263710923863

conversations.body_text: Hi Postmaster,    The German warehouse is experiencing low inventory levels, and there have been some unexpected delays in restocking. We have shipped your order via express courier, with the final leg handled by UPS. Should any customs duties arise, we will cover them for you—please rest assured.  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3263710923863
